name: Black Furies "Death Trip Saturday Night" Promo Poster
description:
Promotional Poster for "Death Trip Saturday Night". Designed by Cliff of the Furies himself, photo by Paul Oâ€™Valle. 

Full color, 11" x 17. Ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Black Tie Revue "Code Fun" Promo Poster
description:
Promotional poster for Pittsburgh's Black Tie Revue. 

Full color poster 11" x 17". Ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Bob Burns and the Breakups "Terminal Breakdown" Promo Poster
description:
Promotional poster for Wisconsin's Bob Burns and the Breakups. 11" x 17" full color. 

Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: "Demons" Tour Poster
description:
Red, black and white tour poster from the "Demons" "Stockholm Slump" tour. 

Poster measures 11" x 17" and ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: "Demons" "Demonology" Promo Poster
description:
Borrowing from the cult-favorite movie "The Warriors" this 11" x 17" glossy promotional poster is for "Demons" final record for Gearhead "Demonology".

Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: "Demons" "Stockholm Slump" Promo Poster
description:
This is a brand new, never displayed promotional poster for the "Demons" second full-length record "Stockholm Slump" released on Gearhead Records. For fans of The Hives, The Hellacopters and Turbonegro! 

Poster measures 18" x 24" and will ship rolled in a poster tube.

name: "Demons" "Riot Salvation" Promo Poster
description:
Promotional poster for "Demons" debut full-length record Riot Salvation released in 2000 on Gearhead Records. This rare limited edition promotional poster"Praying Riot Hands" was drawn by world-famous tattoo artist Theo Mindell from Spider Murphy's Tattoo Parlour in San Rafael, CA.

Full color 11" x 17" poster, and will ship rolled in a poster tube.

name: Dragons "Rock n Roll Kamikaze" Promo Poster
description:
This is a brand new, never displayed  promotional poster for the Dragons and their record "Rock n' Roll Kamikaze" released on Gearhead Records. The record features the smokin'  metal style guitar playing of Kenny who is now in the band The Bronx.  

Poster measures 18" x 24" and will ship rolled in a poster tube.

name: Dukes of Hamburg "Some Folks" Promo Poster
description:
Promotional poster for the Dukes of Hamburg, featuring Russell Quan from the Mummies! 

Poster measures 11" x 17" & is full-color. Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Gitogito Hustler "Love and Roll" Promo Poster
description:
This promotional poster features the lovely ladies of Gitogito Hustler! 

Poster measures 11" x 17" and ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Hellacopters "Cream of the Crap" Promo Poster
description:
Rare, promotional only poster for The Hellacopters "Cream of the Crap Vol. 1" release on Gearhead Records. From 2002! Purple and black promotional poster. 

11" x 17". Will ship rolled in a poster tube.

name: Hellacopters "Cream of the Crap" Insert Poster
description:
Exclusive! Rare! Limited edition 17" x 23" promotional glossy poster for The Hellacopters "Cream of The Crap Vol.1." This poster was ONLY available as an insert with the double gatefold vinyl, but we just found a few of these in the warehouse! 

The vinyl is out of print, so this is the only way you can get these posters, but hurry, first come first served and then they are gone FOREVER!! 

The poster comes factory folded flat in 4 quarters so it could be easily inserted into a record sleeve, and will ship folded in a large envelope!

name: Hellacopters "High Visibility" Promo Poster
description:
Rare! Original 18" x 24" glossy full-color promotional-only poster for The Hellacopters "High Visibility" LP/CD, released on Gearhead Records in 2002. 

Brand new, never displayed. 

Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Hypnomen "Trip with Satan" Promo Poster
description:
Groovy psych imagery abounds! 11" x 17" poster featuring the Hypnomen as a belt buckle on a lovely pair of hips. 

Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: I Walk the Line "Desolation Street" Promo Poster
description:
11" x 17" promotional poster featuring a full band shot on a beautiful rusty brown background.

Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Lords of Altamont "Lords Have Mercy" Promo Poster
description:
This is an ORIGINAL brand new, never displayed promotional-only poster for The Lords of Altamont record "Lords Have Mercy" released on Gearhead Records in 2006. Silver and white ink printed on a black background.

It measures 11" x 17" and will ship rolled in a poster tube. We have a very limited number of these, so don't put off grabbing this rare piece of memorabilia from this band!

name: Mansfields "Cramp Your Style" Promo Poster
description:
This is an Original brand new, never displayed promotional-only poster for The Mansfields' Cramps-meets-Ramones inspired record "Cramp Your Style" released on Gearhead Records in 2008.

It measures 11" x 17" and will ship rolled in a poster tube. Bright eye-catching colors printed on a matte-style paper, no pin holes rips or tears, brand new!

name: Mensen "Oslo City" Promo Poster
description:
Full-color eye-catching graphics inspire the memories of warm summer days. 11" x 17" promotional poster for Mensen's second full-length release, "Oslo City".

Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Mensen "Delusions of Grandeur" Promo Poster
description:
This is a brand new, never displayed promotional poster for the girl band Mensen and their debut record "Delusions of Grandeur" released on Gearhead Records.

It measures 18" x 24" and will ship rolled in a poster tube.

name: Million Dollar Marxists "Give it a Name" Promo Poster
description:
Full color promotional poster, 18 x 24". Art by Dirty Donny.

Poster ships folded.

name: New Bomb Turks "Switchblade Tongues, Butterknife Brains" Promo Poster
description:
This is a brand new, ORIGINAL never displayed promotional poster for New Bomb Turks final full-length record "Switchblade Tongues, Butterknife Brains" released on Gearhead Records in 2003. Only a few of these rare original promotional posters left, so grab this now!

It measures 18" x 24" and will ship rolled in a poster tube.

name: NRA "Machine" Promo Poster
description:
Full color promotional poster for "Machine". Photo by Jamin Barton.

Measures 17" x 11".

Ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: NRA "New Recovery" Promo Poster
description:
Amsterdam's finest punks in action! Promo poster for NRA "New Recovery" release, full color.

Measures 11" x 17".

Poster will ship rolled in a poster tube.

name: Pink Swords "Shut Up and Take It" Promo Poster
description:
Art by Rob Jones (White Stripes artist), photo by Keith Marlowe.

Poster is full color and measures 11" x 17.

Ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Puffball "The Super Commando" Poster
description:
Mopar-loving, high-speed punk rock maniacs from Sweden, this is the promotional poster for Puffball's release "The Super Commando".

Poster measures 11" x 17".

Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Red Planet "Let's Degenerate" Promo Poster
description:
Gorgeous full-color promotional poster celebrating the release of Red Planet's second full-length "Let's Degenerate".

Poster measures 18" x 24".

Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Red Planet "We Know How it Goes" Poster
description:
11" x 17" poster featuring Red Planet performing live.

Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Red Planet "Revolution 33" Poster
description:
Promo poster for Red Planet's first release "Revolution 33" 11 x 17" full color poster featuring a live shot of their drum kit set up in the middle of San Francisco's Market Street.

Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Riverboat Gamblers 2003 Tour Poster
description:
This is a rare limited edition tour poster left over from the Riverboat Gamblers for their first national tour in 2003 promoting their then brand new record "Something to Crow About" on Gearhead Records. Very limited quantities available, first come first served. White space at the bottom of the poster for tour information to be hand written. Above is a great live shot of the band, with information about the new records.

There is a fold in the middle of the poster which measures 11" x 17".

This will ship rolled in a poster tube.

name: Riverboat Gamblers "Something to Crow About" Poster
description:
Full-color glossy promotional poster for The Riverboat Gamblers "Something to Crow About" These are almost sold out, so get yours today!

18" x 24"

Poster will come rolled in a poster tube.

name: Rock n Roll Soldiers Promo Poster
description:
Promotional poster for Rock n' Roll Soldiers, photo by Keith Marlow.

Full color 11" x 17".

Poster ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Spunks "Yellow Fever Blues" Poster
description:
Promotional poster for the Spunks "Yellow Fever Blues" album.

11" x 17" full color.

name: White Barons "Up All Night With" Poster
description:
This is a brand new, never displayed White Barons promotional poster for their dirty garage-punk record "Up All Night With..." released on Gearhead Records.

It measures 11" x 17" and will ship rolled in a poster tube.

name: Wildhearts "Riff After Riff" promotional Poster
description:
This is a brand new, never displayed full color promotional-only poster for the UK band The Wildhearts. This is for their greatest hits record "Riff After Riff" released on Gearhead Records in 2003. Lightning bolt and skull design by the lowbrow pinstripe artist Dirty Donny (Metallica, Demonics, Electric Frankenstein). Only a very few left, then this is sold out and gone forever!

It measures 18" x 24" and will ship rolled in a poster tube.

name: Wildhearts 2004 Tour Poster
description:
Designed by Dirty Donny, these were made to promote the small venue "punk rock" tour The Wildhearts were going to do in March 2004 with The Dragons, which was booked the band was invited by The Darkness to open for them on their first US Tour. Most of the tour was canceled and only four shows at small clubs were actually played, so these posters are incredibly rare.

Measures 11" x 17".

This item ships rolled in a poster tube.

name: Wildhearts "Riff After Riff" CD
description: This collection features some of the notorious British rockers' best known and most loved tracks collected together for the first time including "Stormy In The North"and "Lake of Piss" 13 tracks in all. Bold, catchy rock n' roll, for fans of Motorhead and Cheap Trick.

name: White Barons "Up All Night With..." CD
description: Gutsy, bluesy, ballsy southern-fried rock n'roll from these SF based kids with a bad attitude and a penchant for kickin' rock n' roll ass. For fans of The Merry Widows, Queens of the Stone Age, The Hunns.

name: The Spunks "Yellow Fever Blues" CD
description: NY-based Japanese trash-punk sensations recorded this at the legendary Cyclone Sound Studios (Bouncing Souls, Agnostic Front). Sung mostly in English about sex, Chinese food and motorcycles.

name: Puffball "The Super Commando" CD
description: Puffball is Sweden's answer to Motorhead, Zeke or early Dwarves. 14 tracks of high-octane furious rock n' roll clocking in just over 30 minutes.

name: Pink Swords "Shut Up and Take It" CD
description: 12 tracks of pure, unbridled punk rock fury! This Austin, TX band throws out a classic Dead Boys meets early Reatards, meets The Dwarves two guitar onslaught. Described as "the most in your face roots style punk in years..." Artwork by White Stripes illustrator Rob Jones.

name: NRA "Machine" CD
description: Amsterdam's NRA have been playing aggressive, melodic punk since 1989. For fans of Naked Raygun, Dag Nasty and Black Flag.Features one of the best anthems ever recorded, "Bang Bang" Check it out!

name: NRA "New Recovery" CD
description: Hailing from Amsterdam, The Netherlands, NRA has been a staple on the hardcore punk scene for over 15 years. For fans of mid-80's hardcore such as Government Issue, Naked Raygun, The Adolescents and All.

name: New Bomb Turks "The Night Before The Day The Earth Stood Still" CD
description: The Columbus, OH band's last studio album before they retired, this record features a dynamic blend of their early blistering punk style with the Stones-like swagger of their later era Epitaph releases. Raunchy, meaty, hooky, stick in your craw tunes that showcase why this band was a household name for almost fifteen years!

name: Million Dollar Marxists "Give it a Name" CD
description: Hailing from Ottawa, Canada, The Million Dollar Marxists play punk rock with influences from New Bomb Turks, Pagans,and early Wire. Cover art created by Dirty Donny.

name: Mensen "Delusions Of Grandeur" CD
description: Norway's all-girl rockers released this debut full-length in '00. Raw, catchy and plenty of rock n' roll, for fans of The Runaways, The Muffs, or the Go-Go's.

name: Mensen "Oslo City" CD
description: Oslo, Noway's tough-as-nails rocker-chicks belt out catchy Norwegian rock and roll. Mixed by Nicke Andersson of The Hellacopters. For fans of Joan Jett, Girlschool.

name: The Mansfields "Cramp Your Style" CD
description: What do you get when you take equal parts Cramps, New York Dolls and 50's Sun-era Rockabilly? Why, The Mansfields of course! Hailing from Colorado Springs, CO, this dedicated hardworking band has crafted a record that has swing, swagger and style!

name: Lords of Altamont "The Altamont Sin" CD
description: The Lords Of Altamont are masters of the raw power of 60's garage-punk. Their 3rd full-length release adds legendary bass-player Michael Davis from the MC5 to the roster which fuels the band to a thicker raunchier sound.

name: I Walk the Line "Desolation Street" CD
description: From Helsinki, Finland, I Walk The Line play dark melodic, edgy punk, pulling from influences by The Clash, Murder City Devils and Social Distortion. The band delivers powerful hooks wrapped in a flood of guitars and keyboards on this release, which is their second full-length.

name: Hypnomen "Trip with Satan" CD
description: Finland's Hypnomen are the masters of the groovy instrumental. This Cd features 8 tracks of music inspired by 60's biker movies and beach parties!

name: Gitogito Hustler "Gito Galore" CD
description: The 4 ladies from Tokyo really cut loose on their first US release. 6 amazing tracks of melodic pop punk with beefy guitars, sing-along choruses and more attitude than the baddest kids on the block.

name: Gitogito Hustler "Love and Roll" LP
description:
The Japanese all-girl pop-punk sensations here with the release their debut full-length. 5,6,7,8's meets The Donnas, with a dose of The Shangri-La's and The Runaways thrown in for good measure.

VINYL IS ALMOST SOLD OUT, JUST A FEW COPIES LEFT

name: Gitogito Hustler "Love and Roll" CD
description: The Japanese all-girl pop-punk sensations here with the release their debut full-length. 5,6,7,8's meets The Donnas, with a dose of The Shangri-La's and The Runaways thrown in for good measure.

name: Electric Eel Shock "Beat Me" CD
description:
Electric Eel Shock fills the gaping void between Queens Of The Stoneage, AC/DC and Black Sabbath. Enhanced CD includes video for "Scream For Me".

Only a few CDs left!

name: Red Planet "Revolution 33" CD
description: Power pop gems meet catchy rock n' roll. Think early Cars meets Cheap Trick with a splash of The Undertones and Real Kids thrown in for good measure.

name: Red Planet "We Know How it Goes" CD
description: Pulling from such diverse influences as Cheap Trick and The Cars to The Undertones and The Boys, Bay Area-based New-Wave popsters Red Planet return with their final release, this time trending towards by Brian Wilson-style ethereal pop.

name: The Dragons "Dirty Bomb" 7"
description: Two exclusive tracks from the "Sin Salvation" sessions, only available on this 7"! Hurry, Only a few left!

name: The Dragons "Rock N Roll Kamikaze" CD
description: Originally released by Junk Records in 2001, this is remixed, remastered and includes 5 extra lost tracks from the original recording sessions. This is also the first time this record appears on vinyl.Whiskey-soaked, raw rock n' roll for fans of New York Dolls, Wildhearts and George Thorogood.

name: The Dragons "Sin Salvation" CD
description: This is the 5th full-length studio recording from these legendary San Diego rockers. The Ramones meets the Rolling Stones, with plenty of swagger and Jack Daniels to wash it all down.

name: Bob Burns and the Breakups "Terminal Breakdown" CD
description:
Revved up and stripped down raw punk rawk framed in catchy tunes that clock in under 2 minutes! Garage punk from Steven's Point, WI. The LP is a limited ed. pressing of 500 on slime-yellow vinyl.

For fans of New Bomb Turks, Fear, D.O.A, The Middle Class and The Dils.

name: Black Tie Revue "Code Fun" CD
description: Debut full-length Power Pop from Pittsburgh, PA! For fans of The Raspberries, The Sweet, Red Planet, The Cars and The Yum Yums.

name: Black Furies "Death Trip Saturday Night" CD
description: San Francisco mainstays The Black Furies cut loose with a furious burst of rock n' roll mayhem. The 12 tracks will appeal to fans of Turbonegro and The Hellacopters. As San Jose's Zero magazine said "Loud and Fast, 100% Rock."

name: "Demons" "Stockholm Stump" LP
description: Rare, sealed, limited edition colored vinyl, first pressing! This has been out of print for ages, so grab this rare LP on vinyl now!  For fans of Hellacopters, Backyard Babies, Devil Dogs and MC5. Stockholm Sweden's "Demons" explode on their sophomore LP, Stockholm Slump. The greaser-rock sound of their first release takes a step up to full-force rock n' roll, thanks in part to noted Swedish producer Tomas Skogsberg (Hellacopters, Gluecifer, Entombed, Backyard Babies).

name: "Demons" "Come Bursting Out" 12" EP
description: This is the debut release from Sweden's rebel Greaser rockers "Demons", and features 6 exclusive tracks not available anywhere else! This record is long out of print, but we have just a few left! For fans of Hellacopters, Stooges, Devil Dogs, MC5.

name: "Demons" "Riot Salvation" CD
description:
The debut full length from Stockholm Sweden's "Demons". For fans of early Hellacopters, The Dictators,The Damned and in general dirty greaser rock n' roll. 

Just a few of these CDS left!! When these sell out, it is out of print, and only available digitally. Buy now!

name: "Demons" "Demonology" CD
description: This release compiles the best of unreleased tracks and out of print singles from 1995-2000 on one CD. Nick Green of Red Flag Media said: "A relentless onslaught of two-minute, three-chord wonders, every one a minor masterpiece."

name: "Demons" "Stockholm Slump" CD
description: Stockholm Sweden's "Demons" continue to amaze with their sophomore LP, Stockholm Slump. The greaser-rock sound of their first release takes a step up to full-force rock n' roll, thanks in part to noted Swedish producer Tomas Skogsberg (Hellacopters, Gluecifer, Entombed, Backyard Babies)

name: New Bomb Turks "Switchblade Tongues, Butterknife Brains" CD
description: This is the last official release from Columbus, OH punks New Bomb Turks. This is a collection of rare, out of print material, never before released material and a handful of classic covers. An amazing EP (recorded in 2001 for Glazed) and extra cuts from last years "The Night Before The Day The Earth Stood Still" make up the bulk of this CD, plus a few great covers (Aerosmith's "Chip Away The Stone," The Devil Dog's "Radiobeat" and "Death Of Mighty Joe") and a few other gems round out this must have collection. 16 tracks in all, plus enhanced CD includes a 5 minute trailer for the New Bomb Turks DVD that never got released due to the band breaking up.

name: Hellacopters / Gluecifer Split CD
description:
This is the long out of print split CD with The Hellacopters and Glucifer on Man's Ruin Records, released in 1999. Raw, aggressive, rock n' roll for fans of Turbonegro, Backyard Babies and other ass-kickin' Swedish Garage Punk bands. Features 5 tracks from each band, all exclusive to this release!
Limited quantities available!This comes still sealed in original factory packaging!

name: Hot Rod Pinups DVD
description: Hot rods, hot girls, hot music, hot damn! Grammy nominated photographer David Perry teams up with Gearhead Records to release this DVD based on his best-selling book Hot Rod Pin-Ups. This 60 minute sumptuous sampler of classic 50's style pin-up girls ala Vargas features hotties working in the garage, hanging out at the drag strip and cruisin' country roads. The action is set to a smokin' soundtrack featuring Gearhead Records' roster of rock n' roll, pop and punk bands. It is truly a feast for your ears and eyes!

name: Mansfields "Cramp Your Style" LP
description: What do you get when you take equal parts Cramps, New York Dolls and 50's Sun-era Rockabilly? The Mansfields of course! Hailing from Colorado Springs, CO, this hardworking band has crafted a record that has swing, swagger and style! This is a limited edition pressing of 500 copies on slime-green vinyl, hurry though, these are almost sold out!

name: Spunks "Yellow Fever Blues" LP
description: For fans of Guitar Wolf, meet Japan's The Spunks! Trashy garage punk rock on limited edition (pressing of 500 copies!) gray vinyl! This record rocks!!

name: Electric Eel Shock "Beat Me" LP
description: Japanâ€™s Electric Eel Shock know how to deliver the goods live, and thatâ€™s exactly what Beat Me,  their 2nd album for Gearhead does. Kerrang Magazine says: â€œwith assistance from Grammy nominated producer Attie Bauw (Scorpions, Judas Priest, etc.) EES have made an album that harnesses their energy and captures the very essence of their raw onstage power. Beat Me occupies the gaping void somewhere between Queens Of The Stoneage, AC/DC and Black Sabbath. It's both as heavy and serious as that sounds, yet has a mischievous and fun-filled heart beating underneath the guitar wielding heaviness that is wild, unhinged and damn fun to listen too!â€ Limited edition pressing of 500 on magenta-red vinyl, only a few left!

name: White Barons "Up All Night With" LP
description: Featuring the eye-popping psychobilly Burlesque dancer/singer Eva Von Slut, San Francisco, CA based The White Barons play a blend of punk and rock n' roll infused with infectious backing "whoa" style vocals reminiscent of The Misfits in their heyday. Fueled by an unholy mixture of booze, drugs, and rock n' roll fury, their debut release "Up All Night"  is edgy, bad-assed rock n' roll through and through. This is a limited edition first pressing of 500 copies on white vinyl!

name: Wildhearts "Riff After Riff" LP
description: This collection, released in 2004, features some of the notorious British rockers' best known and most loved tracks collected together for the first time including "Stormy In The North"and  "Lake of Piss" 13 tracks in all! Bold, catchy rock n' roll, for fans of Motorhead, AC/DC and Cheap Trick. This is the very rare pressing on Gearhead Records, limited edition of 500 copies on black vinyl! Only  a few of these rare records left!

name: Mensen "Oslo City" LP
description: Oslo, Noway's tough-as-nails rocker-chicks belt out catchy singalong Norwegian Punk n' Roll. Mixed and Produced by Nicke Andersson of The Hellacopter. For fans of Turbonegro, Joan Jett, Girlschool and the Runaways! This record is almost out of print, so grab your's today, limited edition pressing of 500 copies on black vinyl!!

name: Lords of Altamont "Lords Have Mercy" LP
description: Rare limited edition pressing of 250 copies on slime-green vinyl!!! This is the 2nd full length release from the LA band that believes in fast, hard rock n' roll. 60s garagey punk rock with an edgy biker-band persona, led by "The Preacher" on blistering farfisa organ and vocals. 11 tracks of gear-grinding garage rock with liner notes and production by the infamous MC5's Michael Davis. The vinyl version of this record features an exclusive extra track, only available on the vinyl version!!

name: The Dragons "Sin Salvation" LP
description: This is the 5th full-length studio recording from these legendary San Diego rockers. The Ramones meets the Rolling Stones, with plenty of swagger and Jack Daniels to wash it all down.

name: The Dragons "Rock N Roll Kamikaze" LP
description: Originally released by Junk Records in 2001, this is remixed, remastered and includes 5 extra lost tracks from the original recording sessions. This is also the first time this record appears on vinyl. Whiskey-soaked, raw rock n' roll for fans of New York Dolls, Wildhearts and George Thorogood.

name: The DT's "Light's Out" 7"
description: From Bellingham, WA, The Dt's play heavy 70's-style hard-rock 'n'roll, injected with a dose of soul sensibility, ala Ike & Tina Turner. Features Estrus Records owner Dave Crider and the gut-wrenching bluesy vocals of Diana Young-Blanchard (Madame X), this single features an exclusive B-side track! Pressing of 500 on white vinyl.

name: Bottles and Skulls "Scream Scream" 7"
description: San Francisco's Bottles And Skulls tap into the post punk frenzy of early Wire or Joy Division. Limited edition dark rose-pink vinyl, pressing of 500 copies. Produced by Jay Reatard!! This band was on the fast track up when they ended up breaking up suddenly so grab this rare piece of vinyl today!

name: The Hypnomen "Altamont Boogaloo" 7"
description: 2 Exclusive sexy tracks from one of Finland's best instrumental bands. Final pressing of 300 on tangerine colored vinyl. Then this baby goes out of print!

name: Thunder Boys "Can't Stop Drinking (About You)" 7"
description: Very limited  7" debut single from The Thunder Boys from Ventura. This is a limited-edition pressing of 550 copies, hand screened cover, all copies are hand-numbered in silver ink, the vinyl is deep-pink vinyl! Only a few of these left so grab yours today!! For fans of Johnny Thunders, The Joneses, The Heartbreakers, New York Dolls and Hanoi Rocks!! Two tracks: "Can't Stop Drinking (About You) b/w "Shake Shake".

name: Maggots "Let's Go in '69" 7"
description: Sweden's Maggots cut loose with 2 exclusive tracks on this kick-ass single. "Let's Go in 69" is a 60's trash-garage burnout while "50 Gallon Bladder" cuts loose with a revved up. rockabilly throw down! Rare!! Limited edition Black vinyl pressing of 250 copies!

name: Red Planet "Let's Get Ripped" 7"
description: The unbelievable raw punk 7" from these normally power-popsters contains two tracks (the B side is the Dead Kennedy's "Too Drunk to F***".)

name: Red Planet "Revolution 33" LP
description: This is the debut LP for San Francisco's pop geniuses Red Planet. Limited edition black vinyl pressing of 1000 copies. Ultra-singable power pop gems meet catchy rock n' roll. Think early Cars meets Cheap Trick with a splash of The Undertones and Real Kids thrown in for good measure, with The Posies as project managers!

name: Rock 'n' Roll Soldiers "The Weak Blame the Strong" 12" EP
description: This, the second Rock N Roll Soldiers EP released by Gearhead, features  6 tracks total, including the brilliant "Funny Little Feeling" and the ingenious "Anthem" which appeared on the bands' debut CD for Atlantic entitled. The 4 remaining tracks, "Flag Song," "Barbarian," "Habits I Have" and a brilliant cover of the Love song "Everybody's Gotta Live" are exclusive to this EP!

name: Rock 'n' Roll Soldiers "The High School Sessions" 12" EP
description:
Eugene Oregon's Rock 'n' Roll Soldiers let loose with 6 tracks so powerful, Atlantic Records signed the band after hearing this record!  Recorded while the band was still in highschool, they mix youthful punk rock energy with classic 60's era Rolling Stones style dirty guitar riffs, snotty vocals and plenty of swagger. There are just a few left of this  limited edition pressing of 500 copies on yellow vinyl, manufactured on heavy wax in The Czech Republic. 

STILL SEALED, MINT CONDITION.

name: Limited Edition Gearhead Hair Pomade
description:
GearheadÂ® Hair Pomade is custom-blended by the makers of Cock Grease especially for Gearhead! If you're familiar with the XX Cock Grease pomade, you'll love this the brand new Gearhead Pomade with its own unique scent and color. Plus, the label features exclusive art designed by the world-renowned tattoo artist "Cuz'n" Bill Lorenz from Sacramento Tattoo (who has also done a number of Gearhead shirts and record covers). This limited edition 5 oz. tin of extra stiff long hold Gearhead hair pomade will be available for a limited time only!

Not water soluble.

Ingredients: Petroleum jelly, micro-crystalline wax, bees wax, coconut oil, scent, and color.

Limited Edition
wholesale inquiries welcome

name: Bob Burns and the Breakdowns "Terminal Breakdown" LP
description:
Revved up and stripped down raw punk rawk framed in catchy tunes that clock in under 2 minutes! Garage punk from Steven's Point, WI. The LP is a limited ed. pressing of 500 on slime-yellow vinyl.
For fans of New Bomb Turks, Fear, D.O.A, The Middle Class and The Dils. (RPM 078)

name: Red Planet "Let's Degenerate" CD
description: The 2nd album for San Francisco's Red Planet  was recorded with famed producer Kurt Bloch(Supersuckers/Nashville Pussy/Zeke). 11 amazing tracks of power-pop-new-wave-singalong gems. Cover photo by famed pin-up photographer David Perry!
